analysis.description:
ERC20Token.frozen (/unique_chucks/11/0x43f27b4f518555ff5612ae248b51c1edf76884f2.sol#132) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- transfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x43f27b4f518555ff5612ae248b51c1edf76884f2.sol#144-155)
	- transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x43f27b4f518555ff5612ae248b51c1edf76884f2.sol#159-171)

EKK.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x43f27b4f518555ff5612ae248b51c1edf76884f2.sol#208)
